Package org.bitcoinj.governance

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GovernanceVoteBroadcast.ProgressCallback
    An interface for receiving progress information on the propagation of the vote, from 0.0 to 1.0
    GovernanceVoteBroadcaster
    A general interface which declares the ability to broadcast votes.
    GovernanceVoteConfidence.Listener
    A confidence listener is informed when the level of GovernanceVoteConfidence is updated by something, like for example a Wallet.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExpirationInfo
    Created by Hash Engineering on 5/23/2018.
    GovernanceManager
    Created by HashEngineering on 5/11/2018.
    GovernanceObject  
    GovernanceObject.Validity  
    GovernanceObjectFromFile
    Created by Eric on 6/21/2018.
    GovernanceObjectVoteFile
    Represents the collection of votes associated with a given CGovernanceObject Recently received votes are held in memory until a maximum size is reached after which older votes a flushed to a disk file.
    GovernancePayment
    Governance Object Payment
    GovernanceSyncMessage
    Created by HashEngineering on 2/12/2017.
    GovernanceTriggerManager  
    GovernanceVote  
    GovernanceVoteBroadcast
    Represents a single transaction broadcast that we are performing.
    GovernanceVoteConfidence
    A TransactionConfidence object tracks data you can use to make a confidence decision about a transaction.
    GovernanceVoting  
    LastObjectRecord
    Created by Hash Engineering on 6/2/2018.
    RateCheckBuffer
    Created by Eric on 5/23/2018.
    Superblock  
    SuperblockManager
    Created by Hash Engineering on 6/6/2018.
    VoteConfidenceTable
    Tracks GovernanceVotes that are being announced across the network.
    VoteInstance
    Created by Hash Engineering on 5/24/2018.
    VoteRecord
    Created by Hash Engineering on 5/24/2018.

    An enum that describes why a vote confidence listener is being invoked (i.e.
    GovernanceVoteConfidence.Source
    Information about where the transaction was first seen (network, sent direct from peer, created by ourselves).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GovernanceException  
    RejectedGovernanceVoteException
    This exception is used by the TransactionBroadcast class to indicate that a broadcast Transaction has been rejected by the network, for example because it violates a protocol rule.
    SuperblockException
    Created by Hash Engineering on 6/5/2018.
